title: Web development
content: This includes designing the website, developing the code, and testing the website.

title: App development
content: This includes designing the app, developing the code, and testing the app.

title: Digital marketing
content: This includes search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click (PPC) advertising, social media marketing, and email marketing.

title: IT support
content: This includes troubleshooting problems, installing software, and providing training and more.
